product_name: Salomon XT Wings 3 Trail-Running Shoes - Men's
long_description: These Salomon XT Wings 3 trail-running shoes are built for running in the mountains and across mixed trail terrain, offering a cushioned, responsive ride with a comfortable, lightweight fit. Seamless uppers ensure socklike fit that keeps weight low and the breathability and comfort high; thermoplastic urethane overlays wrap and stabilize insteps. Quicklace(TM) lacing system takes just a quick pull for an exact fit; lace pocket hides lacing away. Large protective toe caps guard against bumps and abrasion, enhancing durability. Triple-density EVA midsole "muscle" maximizes cushioning, comfort and rebound with twice the durability of average EVA foam. Thermoplastic urethane inserts and outsole heel wraps act as the "skeleton" to facilitate heel-to-toe transition and propulsion, as well as enhance side-to-side stability. Contagrip rubber outsoles deliver optimal performance on mixed terrain, offering a mix of abrasion-resistant and grippy rubbers to maximize overal response. Outsoles also feature a mix of differently sized chevron-shaped lugs to maximize trail traction. Salomon XT Wings 3 trail-running shoes have reflective detailing to increase your visibility in low light. Fit tip: runs true to size.
short_description: These Salomon XT Wings 3 trail-running shoes are built for running in the mountains and across mixed trail terrain, offering a cushioned, responsive ride with a comfortable, lightweight fit.
